Name: Hades' Cave
Description: A brother and sister seem to have found themselves lost in a cave. Help them get out of the cave by combining their strengths to overcome their weaknesses.

Name: Bagel Booster
Description: With an unsatiable apetite how will the galaxy ever feed this man? How much can you consume before you're caught by the clerk? You know what happens to thieves.

Name: Rent's Due
Description: Rent's due. Do what is necessary. Make sure you don't get caught! Steal as much as possible and evade police on your scooter.

Name: Tempus Vein
Description: Time is ripping apart at the seams. But why? Uncover the secrets of time in world of Tempus Vein.
